name: Broken Space
description:
In Broken Space, you will travel across a galaxy of stunningly beautiful locations as you blast through over 130 meticulously and uniquely designed levels.

Broken Space is an easy to pick up physics based block breaker that quickly builds up that action as you choose your own path through the galaxy.

STUNNING VISUALS

Each of the 10 locations is visually stunning and contains some of the most impressive sci-fi graphics currently available on mobile devices.

UNIQUE GAMEPLAY

Utilize your cannon and missile launcher as you encounter many unique objects including blocks that detonate, others that redirect energy, and anomalies that gravitationally warp the paths of weapons and energy.

CHALLENGES AND BOSS FIGHTS

Boss fights are spread throughout the galaxy, and completing a location unlocks a challenge mode that may include a timer, extra sphere, or a more powerful boss.

UNLOCK UPGRADES

Collect iridium ore from destroyed blocks to unlock upgrades that include better weapons, more armor, a more powerful sphere, and more.

TILT OR TOUCH

Move either by swiping the screen or use tilt mode, which uses your device's gyro to precisely control the spaceship.

REPLAY KIT
Record and share gameplay videos or broadcast your gameplay live.

iCloud

Your game data is backed up to iCloud and can be synced with Broken Space on Apple TV and across all of your devices.

** Broken Space is optimized for all devices that support iOS 8 and above and includes further enhanced visuals for iPhone 7, 8, and the iPhone X **
